title: Meiji x Kokosake & anohana Receipt Oubo Campaign
synopsis: Meiji is holding a "Meiji x Kokosake & anohana Receipt Oubo Campaign" from June 2 to October 16 to commemorate the September 19 opening of the Kokoro ga Sakebitagatterun Da. (Kokosake) film. The Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae o Boku-tachi wa Mada Shiranai. (anohana) and Toradora! anime staff are making this original anime and anohana's Menma character sings Meiji Chocolate's theme song in the campaign's commercials. (Source: ANN)
